title: Temas de la literatura y cultura espanolas y latinoamericanas
description: Speaking, reading, and writing proficiency in Spanish is required. Examines authors or issues in Spanish and Latin American literature and cultures. Course topic changes; see the Class Search for the current topic. Critical approach designations: Geographies, Histories. Distribution requirement: Senior Seminar. Spanish studies majors may use this course to satisfy the Spanish studies senior exit requirement. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): LIT 101. Enrollment is restricted to senior literature majors.

class_notes: This course is cross-listed with SPAN 190A.
